subject: Shipping time
description_text:
Hi!
I want to buy a Simsonn Plus X Pedal P2-H2 with baseplate but i`m
concerned about the time it takes to arrive.. i`ll be at 1 South Franklin
St - Chicago from 25th july to 2th august and I need the pedals to arrive
during this period..
I saw that it takes 1-2 days production time and the local shipping says
3-7 business days, so although its difficult to know for sure if it will
arrive during this time, do you think if I order on 23th July the order
will arrive on time?
